translation.aboutText: Hello! My name is Pedro Teixeira Villafuerte, and I am a programming student. Throughout my academic journey, I have had the opportunity to learn various programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, and Java, as well as delve into essential concepts like algorithms, data structures, databases, and web development.
translation.project1Text: Project made with React, Material UI library and i18n library.
